    • Method Detail

      • generateJxlintOptions

        public static org.apache.commons.cli.Options generateJxlintOptions()
        Populate the Options for our command line parser. This sets up all the option short names, long names, and help messages. It can also specify whether the argument takes arguments (i.e. "--html index.html"), and whether options are mutually exclusive.

      • getHelpMessage

        public static java.lang.String getHelpMessage(ProgramSettings programSettings)
        Return the command line's help message based on the Options created in generateJxlintOptions().
